tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PriceUpdateLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    old_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    new_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    update_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE price_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    old_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    new_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);
